title: Antiquary failed
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `./erigon --version`
**erigon version 2.55.0**

Chain/Network: 
**sepolia**


#### Actual behaviour
```
INFO[12-05|16:43:00.240] [updateForkchoice] Fork choice update: flushing in-memory state (built by previous newPayload) 
INFO[12-05|16:43:00.282] RPC Daemon notified of new headers       from=4827999 to=4828000 hash=0x27c5d5e503a9cd44caf988a6047f61bff2b67700dda5cc8aaa1d194dd82d69ed header sending=13.833Âµs log sending=375ns
INFO[12-05|16:43:00.283] head updated                             hash=0x27c5d5e503a9cd44caf988a6047f61bff2b67700dda5cc8aaa1d194dd82d69ed number=4828000
INFO[12-05|16:43:03.380] [p2p] GoodPeers                          eth67=1
INFO[12-05|16:43:03.829] [txpool] stat                            pending=0 baseFee=0 queued=0 alloc=557.0MB sys=1.6GB
INFO[12-05|16:43:06.048] P2P                                      app=caplin peers=16

INFO[12-05|16:43:06.210] [Antiquary]: Antiquating                 from=3500000 to=3800000
EROR[12-05|16:43:07.038] Antiquary failed                         app=caplin err="open /opt/erigon/sepolia/caplin/history/373/7314f0f847c3d10afacb9a810412a675c1e41c777ba9c156e558049becd40579.sz: no such file or directory"
```
after erigon restart
```
INFO[12-05|16:52:05.169] [Antiquary]: Antiquating                 from=3700000 to=3800000
EROR[12-05|16:52:05.187] Antiquary failed                         app=caplin err="open /opt/erigon/sepolia/caplin/history/373/c927164c9a0a7c9f58238aea8df9691f66395a71e687223fa7172ebe4b75181d.sz: no such file or directory"
```

Never seen this problem before,
how to fix it ?
